verbose_text: Rescue experiments showed that miR-1231 inhibitor treatment in hsa_circ_0137606 silenced cells significantly rescued their proliferation (XREF_FIG and E), suggesting that hsa_circ_0137606 suppresses BC proliferation and metastasis by sponging miR-1231.
evidence: miR-1231 inhibitor treatment in hsa_circ_0137606-silenced cells significantly rescued their proliferation ( XREF_FIG  and E), suggesting that hsa_circ_0137606 suppresses BC
